ClsC_1a08b4e3.class_description: Entities that describe how widely narratives or legends are spread, emphasizing global or large-scale reach.
ClsC_1a08b4e3.evidence_excerpt: stories can be shared and disseminated at lightning speed, reaching a global audience ... around the world

members.entity_description: Global scope of dissemination of the Hook Man story.
members.resolution_context: One of the most famous urban legends is that of the "Hook Man," a story that has been told in various forms around the world.

members.entity_description: Narratives, including urban legends, that can be quickly shared online to many people.
members.resolution_context: In the age of the internet and social media, stories can be shared and disseminated at lightning speed, reaching a global audience in a matter of seconds.
